00028 smpc_solver::smpc_solver (
00029                 const int N,
00030                 const double Alpha, const double Beta, const double Gamma,
00031                 const double regularization, const double tol)
00032 {
00033     qp_sol = new qp_as (N, Alpha, Beta, Gamma, regularization, tol);

00036 
00037 smpc_solver::smpc_solver (
00038                 const int N,
00039                 const int max_iter,
00040                 const double Alpha, const double Beta, const double Gamma,
00041                 const double regularization, 
00042                 const double tol, const double tol_out,
00043                 const double t,
00044                 const double mu,
00045                 const double bs_alpha, const double bs_beta)
00046 {
00047     qp_ip * qpip_solver = new qp_ip (N, Alpha, Beta, Gamma, regularization, tol);
00048     qpip_solver->set_ip_parameters (t, mu, bs_alpha, bs_beta, max_iter, tol_out);
00049     qp_sol = qpip_solver;
00050 }

00053 smpc_solver::~smpc_solver()
00054 {
00055     if (qp_sol != NULL)
00056     {
00057         delete qp_sol;
00058     }
00059 }

00065         const double* angle,

00067         const double* lb, const double* ub)

00091 int smpc_solver::solve()
00092 {
00093     if (qp_sol != NULL)
00094     {
00095         return (qp_sol->solve ());
00096     }
00097     return (-1);
00098 }
